description:
Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami`s beastly abductor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blazing Knight Sanji!! Kick Down the Fake Wedding!
Honoo no Knight Sanji!! Keritsubuse Itsuwari no Kyoshiki
Sanji, le chevalier enflammé ! Un bon coup de pied dans cette fausse cérémonie !
Санджи – огненный рыцарь!! Отмени ложную церемонию
الفارس المشتعل سانجي! أسقط الزّفاف الزّائف!
炎の騎士[ナイト]サンジ!! 蹴り潰せ偽りの挙式
